name: Easy as Pi
description:
Dash through levels at the speed of Pi, but watch out! You only have 3.14 seconds to beat each level! Easy as Pi is a difficult and fast paced speedrunning game where skill and optimization is rewarded!

Pi, die, and try again!

In Easy as Pi you might die a lot, but that just means you're learning! Explore 4 different areas with unique mechanics, and collect hard-to-reach P.I.E.S. throughout your adventure!

Controls

- Movement: Arrow keys; WASD; Controller joystick/D-Pad

- Quick Restart: R; Right trigger

- Return to menu: Z; Left trigger

- Fullscreen: F

Note: Joystick not recommended.

Some Features:

- 60 fast but very difficult levels

- 10 collectible P.I.E.S.

-  A special Finale level

- An OST with 6 songs(Including Aeternum and Impossibly Irrational)

- Speedrun and TAS potential!

Report  bugs  here! https://forms.gle/BELssgzYLwb2vGNy8
